publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3685 Marilyn Livingstone: 50th Anniversary of NCH Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates NCH Scotland, the children’s charity, on its 50th anniversary; welcomes the anniversary event in the Parliament’s garden lobby on 13 December 2005, with 7:84 Theatre Outreach and Community Action Group showcasing the talent of young people in Scotland; recognises the value of the work NCH undertakes through its 63 projects and services across Scotland in helping some of the most vulnerable children and young people in our society achieve their full potential and make the best of their lives, and further recognises the major contribution NCH Scotland makes across a wide variety of services, including family centres that support families living in some of the most deprived areas in Scotland, respite centres that support families of children with disabilities, residential and support services for young homeless people, foster care projects that are finding family homes for young people in difficulty, criminal justice services that are helping to reduce youth offending, and services that provide support to young people who are the main carers for sick or disabled relatives.
S2M-3685 50th Anniversary of NCH Scotland (lodged on 6 December 2005) Mark Ballard*, Janis Hughes*, Patrick Harvie*, Karen Whitefield*, Donald Gorrie*

S2M-3685 50th Anniversary of NCH Scotland (lodged on 6 December 2005) Ms Wendy Alexander*, Jackie Baillie*, Richard Baker*, Chris Ballance*, Scott Barrie*, Bill Butler*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Cathie Craigie*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Mr David Davidson*, Marlyn Glen*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Ms Sandra White*, Murray Tosh*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Stewart Stevenson*, Margaret Smith*, Iain Smith*, Eleanor Scott*, Alex Neil*, Irene Oldfather*, Mike Pringle*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Bristow Muldoon*, Jim Mather*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Christine May*, Michael McMahon*, Des McNulty*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Maureen Macmillan*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Margaret Jamieson*, Fiona Hyslop*, Christine Grahame*, Karen Gillon*, Tricia Marwick*, Rob Gibson*, Colin Fox*, Michael Matheson*, Tommy Sheridan*, Robin Harper*, Shiona Baird*, Frances Curran*, Kate Maclean*, Pauline McNeill*

S2M-3685 Marilyn Livingstone: 50th Anniversary of NCH Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates NCH Scotland, the children’s charity, on its 50th anniversary; welcomes the anniversary event in the Parliament’s garden lobby on 13 December 2005, with 7:84 Theatre Outreach and Community Action Group showcasing the talent of young people in Scotland; recognises the value of the work NCH undertakes through its 63 projects and services across Scotland in helping some of the most vulnerable children and young people in our society achieve their full potential and make the best of their lives, and further recognises the major contribution NCH Scotland makes across a wide variety of services, including family centres that support families living in some of the most deprived areas in Scotland, respite centres that support families of children with disabilities, residential and support services for young homeless people, foster care projects that are finding family homes for young people in difficulty, criminal justice services that are helping to reduce youth offending, and services that provide support to young people who are the main carers for sick or disabled relatives. Supported by: Mark Ballard, Janis Hughes, Patrick Harvie, Karen Whitefield, Donald Gorrie, Ms Wendy Alexander, Jackie Baillie, Richard Baker, Chris Ballance, Scott Barrie, Bill Butler, Ms Rosemary Byrne, Cathie Craigie, Roseanna Cunningham, Mr David Davidson, Marlyn Glen, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Ms Sandra White, Murray Tosh, Mr Jamie Stone, Stewart Stevenson, Margaret Smith, Iain Smith, Eleanor Scott, Alex Neil, Irene Oldfather, Mike Pringle, Dr Elaine Murray, Bristow Muldoon, Jim Mather, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Christine May, Michael McMahon, Des McNulty, Mr Kenneth Macintosh, Maureen Macmillan, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Margaret Jamieson, Fiona Hyslop, Christine Grahame, Karen Gillon, Tricia Marwick, Rob Gibson, Colin Fox, Michael Matheson, Tommy Sheridan, Robin Harper, Shiona Baird, Frances Curran, Kate Maclean, Pauline McNeill, Linda Fabiani*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-3685 50th Anniversary of NCH Scotland (lodged on 6 December 2005) Sarah Boyack*, Campbell Martin*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Carolyn Leckie*

S2M-3685 50th Anniversary of NCH Scotland (lodged on 6 December 2005) Cathy Peattie*, Susan Deacon*, Helen Eadie*, John Swinburne*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Alex Fergusson*, Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-3685 50th Anniversary of NCH Scotland (lodged on 6 December 2005) Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mr John Swinney*, Mr Mark Ruskell*, Trish Godman*
S2M-3685 50th Anniversary of NCH Scotland (lodged on 6 December 2005) Rosie Kane*
S2M-3685 50th Anniversary of NCH Scotland (lodged on 6 December 2005) Elaine Smith*
S2M-3685 50th Anniversary of NCH Scotland (lodged on 6 December 2005) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-3685 50th Anniversary of NCH Scotland (lodged on 6 December 2005) Mr Jim Wallace*
